operations.notes:
Filtering by folder parent:
  * if not specified - return all folders from all levels
  * parent ID specified - return all folders that have this as a parent
  * special value for parent ID to ask to return root folders - "null"

Results will be limited if a limit is provided but you won't be able to get next page
